text: Agar (bil farz) kissi quran (aasmani kitab) kay zariye pahar chala diye jatay ya zamin tukray tukray ker di jati ya murdon say baaten kerwa di jatin (phir bhi woh eman na latay) baat yeh hai kay sab kaam Allah kay hath mein hai to kiya eman walon ko iss baat per dil jamaee nahi kay agar Allah Taalaa chahaye to tamam logon ko hidayat dey dey. Kuffaar ko to inn kay kufur kay badlay hamesha hi koi na koi sakht saza phonchti rahey gi ya inn kay makano kay qarib nazil hoti rahey gi ta-waqt-e-kay wada-e-elahi aa phonchay. Yaqeenan Allah Taalaa wada khilafi nahi kerta
